SEARCH
Package repository

Class MedicalRecordRepository

Object
MedicalRecordRepository
All Implemented Interfaces:
Repository<MedicalRecord,String>
public class MedicalRecordRepository extends Object implements Repository<MedicalRecord,String>
The MedicalRecordRepository class is responsible for storing and managing medical records for patients. It provides various methods to perform operations such as saving, finding, deleting, and querying medical records based on different attributes (e.g., gender, blood type, age range, diagnosis, contact information). It also supports batch operations and statistical reports.

  • Constructor Details

    • MedicalRecordRepository

      private MedicalRecordRepository()
      Private constructor to initialize the medical record repository. Uses a ConcurrentHashMap to store medical records.

      Returns:
      The singleton instance of MedicalRecordRepository.

    • save

      public MedicalRecord save(MedicalRecord record)
      Saves a MedicalRecord in the repository. If a record with the same patient ID already exists, it will be overwritten.
      Specified by:
      save in interface Repository<MedicalRecord,String>
      Parameters:
      record - The MedicalRecord to save.
      Returns:
      The saved MedicalRecord.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the record is null.

    • findByDiagnosisKeyword

      public List<MedicalRecord> findByDiagnosisKeyword(String keyword)

      Parameters:
      keyword - The keyword to search for in diagnosis descriptions.
      Returns:
      A list of MedicalRecord entries containing the diagnosis keyword.
      Throws:

    • findByDiagnosisCountRange

      Finds medical records within a diagnosis count range.
      Parameters:
      minCount - The minimum diagnosis count.
      maxCount - The maximum diagnosis count.
      Returns:
      A list of MedicalRecord entries whose diagnosis count falls within the specified range.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the count range is invalid.

    • findRecentlyUpdated

      public List<MedicalRecord> findRecentlyUpdated(int days)
      Finds medical records that have been recently updated within a certain number of days.
      Parameters:
      days - The number of days to consider for recent updates.
      Returns:
      A list of MedicalRecord entries updated within the specified number of days.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the number of days is non-positive.

    • findByContactInfo

      public List<MedicalRecord> findByContactInfo(String searchTerm)
      Finds medical records based on contact information (email or phone number).
      Parameters:
      searchTerm - The term to search for in the contact information.
      Returns:
      A list of MedicalRecord entries matching the search term in contact info.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the search term is null or empty.
